commentBody: " But according to the selection rules, they are not supposed to consider anything but a candidate’s contributions to the game. Nothing off the field can come into play."  In other words, it's okay to bribe a governor so you can make more money gambling.  How does that not affect the league and the public's perception of it.  Ray Rice is out in the cold for knocking out his girlfriend.  DeBartolo should remain out in the cold for his greedy cheating.
